import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; export const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: "", password: "", password2: "", }); const { email, password, password2 } = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (

onChange(e)} placeholder="Email" required />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Password" minLength="6" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Password (repeat)" minLength="6" />
You already have an account? Login here.
); }; export default Register;
